ca.thurn.jgail.core

Class ActionTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.thurn.jgail.core.ActionTree

  • public class ActionTree
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to track the number of visits to and rewards associated with given game tree nodes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ActionTree()
      Constructs a new ActionTree root node.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addReward(double reward)
      Adds the provided reward to the stored totalReward.
      ActionTree child(long action)
      Return the child node associated with this action, creating one if it does not already exist.
      int getNumVisits() 
      double getTotalReward() 
      void incrementNumVisits()
      Increases numVisits by 1.

      • ActionTree

        public ActionTree()
        Constructs a new ActionTree root node.

    • Method Detail

      • child

        public ActionTree child(long action)
        Return the child node associated with this action, creating one if it does not already exist.
        Parameters:
        action - Action to retrieve the corresponding child node for.
        Returns:
        The child ActionTree associated with this value.

      • incrementNumVisits

        public void incrementNumVisits()
        Increases numVisits by 1.

      • addReward

        public void addReward(double reward)
        Adds the provided reward to the stored totalReward.
        Parameters:
        reward - Reward to add.

      • getNumVisits

        public int getNumVisits()
        Returns:
        Total number of visits recorded to this game tree node.

      • getTotalReward

        public double getTotalReward()
        Returns:
        Total reward associated with this game tree node.
